segments.text: I see the boy stretching up to grab cookies from the jar, and I can’t help but smile at his determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, but he’s balancing like a little acrobat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl watching him, her hand outstretched, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, and that makes this whole scene even funnier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to make it, but I’m holding my breath just in case.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing from the sink is a mess, but the kids don’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they planned this little cookie heist or if it was just a spontaneous idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, like she’s counting on her brother to come through for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how oblivious the woman is to everything happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is chaotic, but in a way, it’s kind of perfect.
segments.speaker: PAR
